author: senh
title: Greece tourism unaffected by financial crisis
text: BING NEWS: Greek Default: What it Means for Travel Tourism in Greece is as healthy as it has ever been ... For Liadis, Greece bookings have not only been unaffected by financial concerns rather travel to the country has increased.
